name: Time Bomb (robotsmasher1)
description:
Time bomb is a fast paced escape room game, where you must figure out the puzzles with clues and hints around the room you are trapped in. Figure out the hidden story and lore behind the room and reality you are trapped in.
CONTROLS: To use an object on something, hold the object over the thing you are trying to use it on and click the object you want to use. To look around the room, click the arrows on the sides of you screen.
